results.description:
CommonBike maakt fietsdelen leuk en gemakkelijk.

Samen werken we aan open source tools die breed inzetbaar zijn voor bike sharing, zoals een app en sloten.

Op donderdag 12 januari gaan we aan de slag met de app voor CommonBike. Deze is al een heel eind, en samen met jou(?) maken we de app gereed voor een pilot met EasyFiets in Leiden!

We gaan tijdens deze hackathon vooral technisch hacken. Ben je (JavaScript-)programmeur of wil je dit worden - sluit dan aan.

Handige links

• Ontwerp / Demo

• De app-code staat op github

• Praat mee op Slack!

Meer informatie over het open source CommonBike-project vind je op https://common.bike/join en http://commonbike.com/

Vragen/Opmerkingen? Plaats een comment
results.name: #hackathon Creating the CommonBike bike sharing app!

group.name: CommonBike NL Open source bike sharing

results.description:
CommonBike is up and running!

CommonBike, the community of people that creates Open Bike Sharing, is growing! In Leiden the (web) app is already in use for pilot users. We now want to start in other places as well.

This meetup is a general meetup where people of the CommonBike community can meet each other, make plans, design and code a bit.

The program is as follows:

• In the morning some people go by Bim Bim Bikes.

• From 12:00 3+ people lunch in Hopper, and talk about: how to start in Utrecht

• From 13:30 we will split in groups

• Promotional things (newsletter, blog post, press)

• Code things (adding support for SKOPEI e-locks)

• Miscellaneous things

If you'd like to meet other commoners, like the idea of open (source) bike sharing, etc: feel welcome to join!

It might be that we pick an other location on the Witte de Withstraat after 13:30, depending on the amount of people that will join the meetup. Check the Meetup comments or Slack group to get in contact.
results.how_to_find_us: Easy: Navigate to Hopper Coffee. Presumable we'll be at the big table on the left.
results.name: General CommonBike meetup: Current state, Future plans, Pre-hackathon e-lock

group.name: CommonBike NL Open source bike sharing

venue.name: Bazaar of Ideas / Pakhuis de Règâh

results.description:
This next meetup we will come together to meet, give an update about the current status of CommonBike and develop a few things that makes the CommonBike app more awesome. A general meetup.

https://github.com/CommonBike/wiki/blob/master/images/logocommonbike.png?raw=true

We combine this meetup with Vierde vrijdag, a monthly coworking day in The Hague, next to Holland Spoor (train station).

Possible themes are:

• Think about the next city we connect CommonBike to

• Start developing on GoAbout integration

• Improve the mobile app

• Improve a better onboarding process

Be welcome, the meetup starts from 10am and ends around 5pm. Comment if you'd like to participate, have questions, suggestions, etc.

NB We will initiate a weekend meetup in the future (April/May?) as well.
results.name: CommonBike Sprint: App Building

group.name: CommonBike NL Open source bike sharing

results.description:
Today we are going to make an connection with the Skopei API. The result will be that the CommonBike app lists all the Skopei and Urbee bikes. Bike sharing voor everyone!

This will be first integration with autonomous bikes with e-lock. As Urbee sais it on their website: "Sharing is the new ownership!"

Goals & Topics

- Further development of the open source CommonBike app
- Integration with the Skopei API

Program

10:00u Start of this CommonBike session 

Working on integration with Skopei (API)

Working on plotting different shared bikes on the map

13:00 Lunch

13:30 Google hangout session with Skopei 

Working on requirements to get an token/credit system implemented

..... To be defined.

Location

Seats2meet Utrecht Centraal station 

https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/779632531855511552/1484144521/1500x500
results.name: CommonBike + Skopei hackathon!

group.name: CommonBike NL Open source bike sharing

results.description:
Join our Common.bike meetup! We will have a look into the future and discuss:

• What will be the focus for the next 2 month? (starting a pilot with smartbikes + introduce a bike coin ?)

• What type of transactions will CommonBike support

• Can we create a Bike Coin on Ethereum?

• What are the most wanted features?

• Who will do what in the next two months?

Deze bijeenkomst gaat om fun, drinken en eten, elkaar beter leren kennen en om te kijken hoe iedereen er nu in staat. En waar we met z'n allen heen willen. 

We start at 18:00. We will arrange some food and drinks.

In the afternoon (from 15:00) a group starts preparing the introduction of a bike coin. You can join them as well if you are familiar with block-chain.

App: https://common.bike/ 

Code: https://github.com/CommonBike

Chat: http://slack.common.bike/
results.name: CommonBike meetup

group.name: CommonBike NL Open source bike sharing

results.description:
On the 9th of November there will be a brainstorm about the use case of blockchain for social projects.

Both CommonEasy and CommonBike will have a part in this session.

You can find this meetup here: Brainstorm for Social Entrepreneurs - Blockchain for everyone.

There's limited space, so make sure you RSVP on the meetup page of MakeSense if you want to attend.

NOTE: the meetup page of MakeSense shows the official meetup description, the description you are reading now is just an announcement plus a link.
results.name: Announcement: Brainstorm for Social Entrepreneurs @ MakeSense

group.name: CommonBike NL Open source bike sharing

results.description:
CommonBike makes bike sharing easy and more fun by creating open standards & open source apps.

Join the CommonBike meetup & learn about the app development process. December edition.

The next CommonBike (http://commonbike.com/) meetup will be the first of a series wherein everyone interested in the common goals can meet, work together and keep updated of all developments going on.

Theme will be: app development & automatic deployments.

Location is the Social Impact Factory, next to Utrecht Central Station! http://socialimpactfactory.nl/

Program
========

1. CommonBike global update

How did CommonBike develop in the latest month? What did we learn from the previous MakeSense (https://www.meetup.com/MakeSenseNetherlands/) meetup? What are the current project groups to join? A global update.

2. Discussion / Workshop: Automatic, secure deployments

How to deploy an automatic acceptance test environment by using Travis & Heroku. By @pve (https://www.meetup.com/commonbike/members/11953115/) & @bartwr (https://www.meetup.com/commonbike/members/176300212/)

Join Slack (http://slack.common.bike) to stay in contact with the community.
results.name: CommonBike development meetup: December!
